ModMetaData.name: Resumable Job Progress
ModMetaData.author: denev
ModMetaData.description:
Allows some jobs with progress bars to be resumed from the progress level at which they were canceled.
Supported Jobs - Smooth Wall / Smooth Floor - Harvest Plants / Remove Plants - Extract Trees / Replant Trees - Deconstruct / Uninstall Buildings - Work table jobs - Make Stoneblocks - Cook Meals - Butcher table - Biofuel refinery - Electric smelter - Electric crematorium
